parameters: Once upon a time, from zero to one
There was an impact between a dead celestial and a shotting star
死寂的天体与另一颗孤星相遇
When they passed each other, the tides of each other's wourld has been activated
擦肩而过的瞬间，引动了彼此世界里的潮汐
(Just like waking up from a long dream)
Shio, wake up, our class rep is gonna make some announcements
汐，快醒醒，班长要讲重要的事情了
What's wrong with you? You don't look so well
你怎么了？感觉脸色很差
I certainly didn't stay up late playing video games last night!
我昨晚绝对没有熬夜打游戏！
I feel like I'm being seen through
You spent a whole class to prone on desk
I thought you are falling asleep...
(I can still remember what happed before)
(Let me follow the script for now)
Today, a new student will be transferred to our class
今天有一位新同学要转进我们班
先给大家自我介绍一下吧
Hello, everyone. My name is Freelyn
Hello, everyone. My name is Freelyn
It seems that there is nothing to say
好像没有什么可说的了
Oh, by the way, I'm the head of SOS Supernatural Research Club
哦对了，我是SOS超自然研究部的部长
If you are interested, please join us
大家有兴趣的话，欢迎加入我们
Our class is busy too. Don't try to trick our classmates to work for you
学园祭我们班也很忙的，可别想着骗我们班同学去给你干活
Go to the empty seat first and sit down
(It seems to be no different from the last time)
(好像跟上一次没有什么区别)
From now on, we'll be deskmate
从今天起，我们就是隔壁桌了
Why you staring up at me
Should I pretend to be shy?
我是不是应该害羞一下？
By the way, have I met you before?
说起来……我们是在哪见过吗？
This type of flirting has fallen out of fashion
Do you remember when you was young, there was a woman......
还记得你小时候被别的女人……
I wanna join the SOS Supernatrual Research Club!
Are you interested in that weird club?!
你竟然会对那个奇怪的社团感兴趣！？
My bad, I'll lower my voice next time
Huh? How come you're able to hava a such normal conversation with people you first meet?
嗯？不对，你竟然能跟第一次见的人那么正常的对话？
It doesn't like you......Don't tell me......
It doesn't like you......Don't tell me......you are......
这不太像你啊……难道……你们……
I don't know I'm getting attractive here
I'm so attractive that can even get people to join our clubs
竟然能让人主动加入我们这个奇怪的社团
Even if I didn't, you'd have lured me in
反正我不说你也会把我们骗进去的
How the hell come you know me this much?
奇怪，你怎么那么了解我
Don't tell me you are......having crush on me
Can you just stop make fun of me? Big sis
就不能少捉弄我一次吗大姐头
Big sis? Nice nickname, you can call me by it then
大姐头？这称呼不错，以后就这么叫我吧
You have to promise you won't trick on me again
你先答应我以后不捉弄我
Are these two really meeting for the first time?
这两个人……真的是刚认识吗
请问你们几个聊够了吗
I wonder what different in this time......
不知道这一次又会有什么不同呢……
Hey. You finally awake! We just started the school festival
总算睡醒了吗，再睡久点你就要错过学园祭了
There's no way I would have slept that long!!
我再怎么睡也不会睡那么久好吗！
Now that you're awake, do you want to walk around for a while?
既然睡够了那要一起去逛逛吗
(WangMilk will be on the stage later, I won't have much time for walk......)
(王缪可过一会就会被叫去舞台剧那边了，也逛不了多久……)
Yeah......no, I was considering about your rehearsal schedule
没什么……我在想你什么时候去排练
I thought this suppose to be a surprise
我还想着到时候给你个惊喜呢
They said I'm done for today
他们说今天没我什么事了
I know it, because Takuya have not finish writing the script, right?
我知道，塔库亚写不出剧本对吧！
Not really, he finished it already
啊？没有啊，剧本早就写完了
Or what? How do we rehearse withou a script
有什么问题吗？剧本没写完的话要怎么排练
So why don't you go to rehearsal?
所以你为什么不用去排练呢
Takuya told me that never go there, he made it so much mysterious
而且塔库亚还让我千万别过去，好像很神秘那样
But is rehearsal will keep going after you left
但是少个人还能继续排练吗
Just a costar, nothing could be wrong
What about blackboard painting? Is Ari doing it?
那黑板报呢？雅莉还要画吗？
Not familiar with her......Is she drwaing good?
我跟她不太熟……她会画画吗？
She is pretty good on drawing!
But she need to work on stage performance instead of blackboard drawing
不过舞台剧那边挺忙的，应该是没有时间去画的了
Shio, are you interested in blackboard drawing?
汐是对黑板报有兴趣吗？
Our class rep says whoever wanted to do it can do, better than no one
班长说谁想画的话可以直接动手，反正总比没有好
Wow~My dear clum member finally awake~
噢~我亲爱的新部员终于醒了吗~
You have more energy to work when you wake up~
睡饱饱就更有力气去干活了呢~
Go go go~Let's go to the square~
走走走~我们快点去广场~
I even know the tents have been set up because you forgot you've already reminded your club members, and now they are looking for you
我还知道帐篷已经搭好了，因为你已经跟其它部员说过了但是自己忘了，而他们现在正在到处找你
(That was the story from previous loop, hopefully this time won't change)
(上一次是这样的，这次应该也差不多吧)
Well, go to Activity Square then~
To make sure what you're tellimg me is true, of course
那当然是确认下你说的话啊~
